body.name: Logitech Design Collection Limited Edition Wireless Mouse
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 2 hrs 40 mins
features: COLORFUL DESIGNS: each colorful mouse from the Limited Edition gives you a vibrant look to create your personal desk setup
PORTABLE + COMFORTABLE: lightweight, portable design with built-in USB storage makes for easy travel to meetings or on-the-go; soft rubber side-grips add extra comfort
10 M WIRELESS RANGE: 10 m of effective operating wireless range (2.4 GHz) give you total freedom and a tidy desk with no wires
12-MONTH BATTERY LIFE: Efficient power-saving technology gives 12 months of battery life on a single, pre-installed AA battery
UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY: Easy plug-and-play compatibility across many devices and operating systems, including Windows®, MacOS, Chrome OS™ and Linux®. Available USB port required
UNIFYING RECEIVER: Unify up to six compatible devices-like keyboards or extra mouse-on one included USB receiver for a perfect wire-free desk setup
MADE WITH RECYCLED PLASTIC: Plastic parts in Design Collection Wireless Mouse include post-consumer recycled plastic ( Blue Aurora, Golden Garden, POW: 54%, and Chirpy Bird, Positive Vibes: 22%)
body.description: DESIGNS THAT CLICKSmall, comfortable, super responsive, and completely wireless. The compact size is perfect for tight workspaces and anyone with smaller hands-even kids. Click at your desk, at home-or on the go-for a whole year with one pre-installed battery.KEY FEATURES | LIGHTEN UP YOUR DESKThere's a Design Collection mouse for every style and workspace. Give your mood (and your setup) a boost with a creative splash of bright color.COMPACT COMFORTGet hours of comfort at your desk or on-the-go-thanks to the sculpted design and smooth rubber side grips. Lightweight and portable, it's easy to throw in your bag or carry to your next meeting. The compact design is a perfect fit for kids or anyone with smaller hands, making it a great option for homeschooling.EASY NAVIGATION, PRECISE CONTROLNavigate more easily with a controlled line-by-line scrolling experience. No more annoying missed clicks-the optical sensor allows you to track with smooth and accurate cursor control on almost any surface.12 MONTHS. ONE AA.Your mouse takes a power nap when not in use, so it lasts a whole year on a single pre-installed AA battery. You just might forget about batteries altogether. BETTER THAN A TOUCHPADGet more done by adding it to your laptop. According to a recent study, laptop users who chose this mouse over a touchpad were 50% more productive and worked 30% faster.PLUG & PLAY SIMPLICITY10 meters (33 feet) of wireless freedom-because cute style loves a wire-free desk or a flexible on-the-go workspace. Easy plug-and-play means you can just plug in the USB receiver and get started in seconds. This mouse is compatible with Windows®, macOS®, and Linux® And it's a certified Works with Chromebook product.UNIFYING RECEIVERSix compatible devices, one USB receiver. Logitech Unifying technology lets you add a keyboard, or any other compatible device to the included USB receiver for a perfect wire-free setup. MADE WITH RECYCLED PLASTICThe plastic parts in the Design Collection Wireless Mice include a minimum of 22% certified post-consumer recycled plastic- to give a second life to end-of-life plastic from old consumer electronics and help reduce our carbon footprint.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.9 4.9 out of 5 stars 53 ratings 4.9 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've used logi for years at home and at work. I ordered a specialized mouse directly from a computer company and they messed up the order for unknown reasons and the mouse never arrived. I needed something right away so I went back to my old standard Logitech and it works as expected. I find that with continued , daily use, they wear out after a while (maybe 18 months?) but the price is so good that it is not an issue. Pay attention to the price based on the design. They are all the same but with different art work. The price changes with the artwork so unless you have your heart set on a certain design, shop by price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I inadvertently bought, so I had to return it. But I bought others in the past of the same brand and style. They're really functional and work great. They work so great that one of my colleagues sold one of mine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use it every day. Love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice little mouse
reviews.reviewText: My favorite brand. Nice and compact. Downside loud when clicking. Have the same mouse and it is very quiet. Not dreadful but annoying if others are in room

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Been using logitech mouses forever now, love this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Simple Mouse
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is the perfect simple mouse for anyone who is needing a mouse for their laptop or computer. The design is so cute and looks exactly like it is pictured! It is very simple to use and I have had absolutely no problems with it.
